DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to establish a repository of human bile as a resource for studies evaluating molecular predictors of biliary cancer risk.
DOC.brief_title: Storage of Bile From Routine Procedures to Study Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim of this study is to establish a repository of human bile to serve as a resource for studies looking at molecular predictors of biliary tract cancer. The development of fluid based biomarkers will enable early diagnosis in at-risk individuals with a recognized risk factor for cholangiocarcinoma, as well as provide surveillance mechanisms for screening populations where biliary tract cancer has a high incidence.
DOC.criteria: Presenting to IU for treatment of biliary tract disease; Age greater than or equal to 18 Problems other than biliary tract disease
